title: Find correlation from interval estimate for slope

content.question: A 90 percent confidence interval for the slope of a regression line is determined to be (-0.181, 1.529). Which of the following statements must be true?

choices.label: The correlation coefficient of the data is positive.
The sum of the residuals for the data based on the regression line is positive.
A scatterplot of the data would show a linear pattern.
The slope of the sample regression line is 1.348.
The slope of the sample regression line is 0.

content.answer: The correlation coefficient of the data is positive.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Construct a confidence interval, provided conditions for inference are met.
